Stereotype.name: EJBCreateMethod
Stereotype.notes: Indicates that the operation represents an EJB Create Method.

Tag.name: EJBRoleNames
Tag.description: A comma-delimited list of strings designating the security roles that may invoke the operation.

Tag.name: EJBTransAttribute
Tag.description: Defines the transaction management policy for the operation.
Tag.values: NotSupported | Supports | Required | RequiresNew | Mandatory | Never

Stereotype.name: EJBFinderMethod
Stereotype.notes: Indicates that the operation represents an EJB Finder Method.

Tag.name: EJBRoleNames
Tag.description: A comma-delimited list of strings designating the security roles that may invoke the operation.

Tag.name: EJBTransAttribute
Tag.description: Defines the transaction management policy for the operation.
Tag.values: NotSupported | Supports | Required | RequiresNew | Mandatory | Never

Stereotype.name: EJBRemoteMethod
Stereotype.notes: Indicates that the operation represents an EJB Remote Method.

Tag.name: EJBRoleNames
Tag.description: A comma-delimited list of strings designating the security roles that may invoke the operation.

Tag.name: EJBTransAttribute
Tag.description: Defines the transaction management policy for the operation.
Tag.values: NotSupported | Supports | Required | RequiresNew | Mandatory | Never

Stereotype.name: EJBEntityHomeInterface
Stereotype.notes: Indicates that the class represents an EJB Entity Home.

Stereotype.name: EJBRemoteInterface
Stereotype.notes: Indicates that the class represents an EJB Remote Interface.

Stereotype.name: EJBSessionHomeInterface
Stereotype.notes: Indicates that the class represents an EJB Session Home.

Tag.name: EJBSessionType
Tag.description: Indicates whether or not the EJB Session Bean maintains state.

Stereotype.name: EJBPrimaryKey
Stereotype.notes: Indicates that the supplier of the dependency represents the EJB Primary Key class for the EJB Entity Home represented by the client.

Stereotype.name: EJBCmpField
Stereotype.notes: Indicates that the attribute represents a container-managed field for an EJB Entity Bean with container-managed persistence.

Stereotype.name: EJBPrimaryKeyField
Stereotype.notes: Indicates that the attribute is the primary key field for an EJB Entity Bean with container-managed persistence.

Stereotype.name: EJBRealizeHome
Stereotype.notes: Indicates the supplier of the dependency represents an EJB Home Interface for the EJB Implementation class represented by the client.

Stereotype.name: EJBRealizeRemote
Stereotype.notes: Indicates the supplier of the dependency represents an EJB Remote Interface for the EJB Implementation class represented by the client.

Stereotype.name: EJBImplementation
Stereotype.notes: Indicates that the class describes an EJB Implementation class.

Stereotype.name: EJBSessionBean
Stereotype.notes: Indicates that the package represents an EJB Session Bean.

Tag.name: EJBEnvEntries
Tag.description: A comma-delimited list of tuples, designating the environment entries used by the EJB Enterprise Bean.

Tag.name: EJBNameInJAR
Tag.description: The name used for the EJB Enterprise Bean in the EJB-JAR.

Tag.name: EJBReferences
Tag.description: A comma-delimited list of tuples, designating the other EJB Enterprise Beans referenced by the EJB Enterprise Bean.

Tag.name: EJBResources
Tag.description: A comma-delimited list of tuples, designating the resource factories used by the EJB Enterprise Bean.

Tag.name: EJBSecurityRoles
Tag.description: A comma-delimited list of tuples, designating the role names that may invoke ALL operations on the EJB Enterprise Bean.

Tag.name: EJBTransType
Tag.description: Indicates whether the transactions of the EJB Session Bean are managed by the EJB Session Bean or its container.

Stereotype.name: EJBEntityBean
Stereotype.notes: Indicates that the package represents an EJB Entity Bean.

Tag.name: EJBEnvEntries
Tag.description: A comma-delimited list of tuples, designating the environment entries used by the EJB Enterprise Bean.

Tag.name: EJBNameInJAR
Tag.description: The name used for the EJB Enterprise Bean in the EJB-JAR.

Tag.name: EJBReferences
Tag.description: A comma-delimited list of tuples, designating the other EJB Enterprise Beans referenced by the EJB Enterprise Bean.

Tag.name: EJBResources
Tag.description: A comma-delimited list of tuples, designating the resource factories used by the EJB Enterprise Bean.

Tag.name: EJBSecurityRoles
Tag.description: A comma-delimited list of tuples, designating the role names that may invoke ALL operations on the EJB Enterprise Bean.

Tag.name: EJBPersistenceType
Tag.description: Indicates whether the persistence of the EJB Entity Bean is managed by the EJB Entity Bean or its container.

Tag.name: EJBReentrant
Tag.description: Indicates whether or not the EJB Entity Bean can be called reentrantly.

Stereotype.name: EJB-JAR
Stereotype.notes: Indicates that package represents an EJB-JAR.

Stereotype.name: EJBDescriptor
Stereotype.notes: Indicates that the component represents an EJB Deployment Descriptor.

Stereotype.name: EJBClientJAR
Stereotype.notes: Indicates that the client of the dependeny represents an ejb-client-jar for the EJB-JAR represented by the supplier of the dependency.

Stereotype.name: EJBAccess
Stereotype.notes: Indicates that the association defines a security role name relationship between an Actor and an EJB Enterprise Bean.

Stereotype.name: EJBReference
Stereotype.notes: Indicates that the navigable end of the association represents a referenced EJB Enterprise Bean.
